title: Pekka Hamalainen, Comanche and the Americas

content.question: In your responses, be sure to address all parts of the questions you answer. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. You may plan your answers in this exam booklet, but no credit will be given for notes written in this booklet. Use the passage to answer all parts of the question that follows. Identify ONE way in which the author challenges commonly held assumptions about the Americas in the age of European colonialism. Explain ONE example of a society other than the Comanche that made the type of transition described by the author in the first paragraph. Explain ONE example of a nomadic empire other than the Comanche that successfully confronted an established state or states in world history.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
